=== The Homepage of Khandakar Mujahidul Islam ===
Hello, I'm Khandakar Mujahidul Islam from Bangladesh. I'm a core member of <nowiki>[[http://www.bengalinux.org|Ankur Bangla]]</nowiki> which are working for supporting Bengali/Bangla on GNU/Linux. I have been using GNU/Linux for the past six years. I've been using Ubuntu ever since Breezy come out. I've translated many applications of GNOME, KDE, Debian, Ubuntu, Mandriva, Fedora, Red Hat & PC-BSD in Bengali as a core member of <nowiki>[[http://www.bengalinux.org|Ankur Bangla]]</nowiki>.
